name: Earthling (Bigurino2010)
description:
It's not clear but, you're an earthling. Earthlings are dumb. They live in micro-planets. It's just their house and a garden and that's the whole planet. They feed the planet a goo that gives it gravity so that is why their planets are planets. They don't know how to shoot so when intruders come, they need to defeat somehow.

Controls:

W for up

A for left

S for down

D for right
